subject: NCAA Ice Hockey Championships
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Roughly 15 miles separate Connecticut neighbors Yale and Quinnipiac, but both are part of an unlikely group vying for the N.C.A.A. hockey title.
snippet: Roughly 15 miles separate Connecticut neighbors Yale and Quinnipiac, but both are part of an unlikely group vying for the N.C.A.A. hockey title.
